name: oaks-letter
effect: Grants access to Flower Paradise and Shaymin.
short_effect: Allows access to Seabreak path, Flower Paradise, and Shaymin.

flavor_text.black_white: A letter from Prof. Oak. Written in it is a request for you to go to Rt. 224.
flavor_text.black_2_white_2: A letter from Prof. Oak. Written in it is a request for you to go to Rt. 224.
